thread.title: Ghosts on the High Level Bridge
thread.title_full: Ghosts on the High Level Bridge

title: Ghosts on the High Level Bridge
text:
Only registered TrekEarth members may write critiques. Photographer's Note 
The High Level Bridge is one of the main crossings over the Tyne joining Newcastle and Gateshead. The High Level Bridge is a multi purpose bridge. on the lower level there are two pedestrian walkways, as featured in my shot, with a one way road through the centre section. running above this there is a railway track in constant use. As i was framing the shot up i heard people walking behind me so a waited for them to walk passed before opening the shutter to add a bit more character to the shot, as the shutter was open for 3 seconds. 
Nobody has marked this note useful
